attributes.action: NO to change in the Premier League!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Say no to Change in the Premier League!

The fans like things the way it is and to change the Premier League to 2 leagues will take a part of the enjoyment out of it whereas clubs from across the country wont be able to compete with each other. 
    As a Cardiff City fan id be pretty certain that my club would be one of the teams in the division (if there are 18 clubs in both) but i wouldn't want that. If we were ever to make it id want to do it the old fashioned way and then expect travels from Chelsea to Newcastle and im sure many otehr fans from teh Championship also agree.

Please Sign this petition to try to voice the fans feelings that we dont want change!!!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
